item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Westside Bar and Grill

Westside Bar and Grill is a somewhat new addition to the New Haven bar scene, located in Westville. The management at Westside has reserved a back party room for the NHC and will be providing us with a small buffet of appetizers (wings, pasta, etc...)

*UPDATE*
Drink specials offered to the NHC will run till 7pm and include:
$3 drafts
$5 Select Martinis
2-for-1 well drinks

Also, there is a free parking lot located behind the bar for any members who will be driving to happy hour tonight.

If you plan on coming, please RSVP so I can inform the manager of the number of people who are coming so that they can provide adequate amounts of food and staffing.

Contact: Jeanie (860) 942-4708


Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Westside Bar and Grill
